mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase(sale_id, item_id, buyer_id, price, bought_at) VALUES (#{saleId}, #{itemId}, #{buyerId}, #{price}, #{boughtAt})
mapper.select: SELECT P.sale_id, P.item_id, P.price FROM purchase P INNER JOIN sale S ON P.sale_id = S.id WHERE P.buyer_id = #{userId} AND P.use_status = 0 AND S.expiration_status = 0 ORDER BY S.expiration_date ASC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
